channel.title: Vauge newby question
channel.description:
ok, does anyone have any good tutorials on coding runescape java source? or just a really good 317 command making guide. thanks. if any one has any testscape tuts thats the source im using.
Also another vauge newby question, whats the difference between 317, 508, 562, and all the other server types.

item.title: Vauge newby question
item.dc:creator: @jose3121 jose3121
item.description:
@jose3121 wrote:

okay here’s some commands help

if (command.startsWith("command") && (playerRights >= 0))
command in the" " is what the command’s name is ::command
PlayerRights >= 0)) that shows what rank the person needs to use the command
0 is normal player
1 is mod
2 is admin
3 is owner
and if you want a donar command you put && (donator >= 1))
and in the character file there’s a line that says donator and it shows donator = 0
if it’s 1 the player is a donator and can use the command.

The rest of the commands:
okay if you want to add items to a players inventory the command will be

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“command name”))

{

addItem(4716, 1); //ADDS THE ITEM (ITEMID,AMOUNT)
addItem(4718, 1);
addItem(4722, 1);
addItem(4720, 1);
addItem(6585, 1);
addItem(4151, 1);
addItem(4131, 1);
addItem(157, 1);
addItem(5698, 1);

}
[/code]
If you want a player to teleport to a certain coordinate the command will be

if (command.startsWith("command name here")) { sendMessage("You are teleported to train"); teleportToX= 2674; //change the coords for a different place teleportToY= 3713; }
if you want to show players the command will be

if (command.startsWith("players")) { sendMessage("There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players!"); }
When you do ::players it shows the amount of players on

That’s some of the basic commands there is many more commands pm me if you need further help

Read full topic
